    All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.interfaces.ClientRequest, edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.interfaces.Request, edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.interfaces.RequestIdentifier, ExtensiblePacketInterface, PacketInterface

    public class SelectResponsePacket<NodeIDType>
extends BasicPacketWithReturnAddressAndNs<NodeIDType>
implements edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.interfaces.ClientRequest
    This class implements a packet that contains a response to a select statement.
    Author:
    Westy
